text: wondering about your happily ever after
falling in love and exhilarating and
life-changing experience when you meet
someone who you feel a deep connection
with you're filled with excitement and
anticipation for what the future might
hold however even when your head over
heels in love it's not always easy to
know whether you're with the right
person that's why it's important to pay
attention to the signs that can indicate
whether you found the one so here are
your lucky signs that you're in love
with the right person
Zen do you always feel on edge in your
relationship you always worry about what
they're doing when you're not around or
do you feel a sense of calmness and
inner peace with them according to Helen
Fisher a love expert at Rutgers
University being calm around your
partner could be the sign that you found
the right person Fisher believes that
when you're with the right person your
body releases chemicals that promote
feelings of comfort and Trust such as
oxytocin and vasopressin research has
also shown that feeling comfortable and
authentic with your partner is crucial
for the long-term success of a
relationship a study published in the
personality in social psychology
bulletin found that couples who reported
feeling more authentic in their
relationships were more satisfied with
their partners and had greater
commitment to their relationship
so if you feel completely comfortable
with being yourself and sharing your
thoughts and feelings with your partner
it could be a positive indication that
you're in love with the right person
without words
have you ever felt so connected with
your partner that you could communicate
with them without saying a word
according to Dr John gottman a renowned
relationship expert and professor
emeritus of psychology at the University
of Washington
nonverbal communication is a critical
component of a couple's emotional
connection and overall satisfaction in
their relationship in his book the seven
principles of making marriage work Dr
gottman explains that couples who can
effectively communicate non-verbally
have a higher chance of having long
lasting and fulfilling relationships he
highlights that these nonverbal cues can
help Partners better understand each
other's emotional needs and Foster a
deeper level of intimacy research has
shown that non-verbal communication is a
crucial predictor of a relationship
success a study published in the journal
personal relationships found that
couples who displayed high levels of
synchrony in their nonverbal Behavior
had more satisfying relationships and
were less likely to break up so have you
noticed any non-verbal cues that you and
your partner share
good direction
imagine you and your partner have been
together for a while now there's always
been a nagging question in the back of
your mind are you and your partner
working towards the same goals in life
you've had some great times and some
tough times but overall you do feel like
you have something special
if so that could be a sign that you
found the right person Dr Terry orbuck a
psychologist and research professor at
the University of Michigan notes that
having a shared sense of purpose is a
key component of a strong and Lasting
relationship according to her research
couples who have a sense of shared
meaning in their lives tend to have
better communication more intimacy and a
stronger commitment to each other this
is supported by a study published in the
Journal of Social and personal
relationships which found that couples
who shared a sense of meaning and
purpose in life reported higher
relationship satisfaction and were more
likely to stay together in the long run
mutual respect mutual respect is an
essential aspect of a healthy and
fulfilling relationship when you're in
love with the right person there exists
a deep sense of respect between both of
you you genuinely value each other's
opinions ideas and boundaries fostering
an environment of open communication and
understanding there's a beautiful
balance of give and take
where compromises are made and Common
Ground is found this mutual respect
creates a strong bond fostering equality
trust and a deep sense of connection
it's a lucky sign that you found the
right person to love one respect is at
the core of your relationship
intuition and gut feeling
last but not least
what does your gut tell you sometimes
you just have a gut feeling that you're
with the right person your intuition
tells you that this is the real deal in
deep down you know you're in love with
the right person can you relate to any
of these signs feel free to share your
